mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Guide to the Parasites of Fishes of Canada Part V: Nematoda

subSubSection.paragraph: Sites: alimentary tract, body cavity, mesenteries, musculature, viscera
Distribution: Atlantic, British Columbia , Labrador, New Brunswick , Nova Scotia , Pacific, Quebec
